channel.title: Making Admin/Mod!
channel.description:
Hey i want to know how i make myself mod/admin. I know i have to chance at characters -> [name] -> player rights to 3/2... But if i do that, compile, I'm still not Admin/Mod. Help me?
~Baloeh

item.title: Making Admin/Mod!
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

if youre using testscape
just go to client and search for (“Nvi ible”))
it should come up with this

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nvi ible")) { playerRights = 3; }

change the nvi ible to your name, and change playerrights to whatever you want that player to be
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner

Read full topic

Same character-rights…
Do some1 know how I can fix this?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 03:46:25 PM[/size][hr]Lol i know now.
I can’t see, but if i log in with another acc, i can see the crown.
lvls not working btw

item.title: Making Admin/Mod!
item.dc:creator: @Nics Nics
item.description:
@Nics wrote:

  1. Go to Characters
  2. Find your name.
  3. Look for “Playerrights=”
  4. Change to ( Depending on ur server type ) 1, is usually mod. 2 is admin.
  • Try 3 for admin if this dosent work.
  1. While doing this, make sure ur account is logged offline.
  2. After you save your characters file, with the edited rights.
    RE LOGIN

If this dosent work, post agine.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 02:57:52 PM[/size][hr]PS: If this dosent work, find ur character name in the files, open it, copy all of text and paste it in here. Il fix it for you. ( And make you a pwning level )

Read full topic
